attributes.action: To make the Dartford crossing Toll free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tunnels and the bridge have generated enough money to pay for themselves twice over. The crossings should now be free to all users and the maintenace of the crossings handed over to the Highways Agency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
